values:
Ive spent the last 5 weeks of my life as a gypsie, smoking out and listening to Circa Survive. 

The tour with 30 seconds was incredible. 

I don't think I've ever been this happy.

Our song for video and radio debut on the 6th of June. 

Stoked.

Well so we've been in NYC for the last few days. Busy busy. Bamboozle was tiiight. Our single hits radio on June 5th. Crazy. 

Warped Tour is gonna be sweet.

We go back out with 30 seconds in a few days. Im stoked. 

Living out of hotels and gas stations make you fat.

Wow, this is insane. I looked back in my livejournal like i do periodically and i stumbled over my first entry I ever wrote back in December of 2002...

Yeah, so this is my first journal entry. I'm excited to start doing this whole journal thing.
Last night was pretty awesome, I again got the taste of what i want to do for a living. I saw Taking Back Sunday for the second time @ Jack Rabbits and they were fucking awesome...Whenever i go to a show i know that, that's what i have to do with my life and it only makes me more and more devoted to our band and makes me a better leader. I know its a risky business and that throwing away all my plans for school (senior year and college) isn't the smartest thing to do, but ill probably just fall back on my dad in the radio business. Which leads me to the point that I can't always fall back on people and maybe I'm too much of a dreamer and that one day i will hit rockbottom harder than ever and realize how harsh life really is. We'll see.

Back from L.A.
The video's done. Crazy. It'll be out in May.
I love California.
We almost died on the flight home. It was the most life changing experience I've ever had. 
In a week we'll be on tour for about 4 months.

Back in Mew York City again. Playing tonight at CBGB'S.

We'll be back for a few days then we''re flying out to L.A. to shoot our first video. After that we're going back out with 30 seconds to mars, aiden, then we play Bamboozle.

Awesome. Ive never seen so many states.

Canada sucks.

Alright, so tomorrow we leave for Cleveland, Ohio to meet up with 30 Seconds to Mars (Jared Leto) and Aiden.

Sometime mid April, we're headin out to L.A. to shoot our first video. I gotta get my platinum grill before then for sure. 

The new Thrice record is phenominal. 

I saw V is for Vendetta tonight. I wasn't blown away but it was worth seeing.

So, The Starting Line Tour has come to an end. How sad. Good memories though.
So, we slowly make our way to Texas starting tom.
We should be back around the 17th in time to catch up with Jared Leto and 30 Seconds to Mars for a few weeks. One of the dates is in Canada. Crazy eh? 

I went to the beach for the first time in a long time. Hung out with a bunch of old friends that I love and miss. Had a sandy orgy with them. It was cool, whatever.

one more date left (jax) with the starting line.

im so sad to be leaving the tour. I love those guys so much. Kenny's the greatest person in the world. 

we played House of blues (orlando) tonight. it was a dream come true.

we've driven about 60 hours in the last week and a half. 

im tired.

Last post before my life is changed once again forever.
Our first real National tour starts in approximately 10 hours.
Goodbye life.

Home is good. Off again on Saturday with The Starting Line. The record is done and sounds amazing. We're so stoked. We'll be back in a few weeks. 

Tonight I went to a show at Jackrabbits with joey and Brandon, i drank alot and we hung out with the drummer from Good Charlotte who plays in TSO now. Later we went to Whataburger. Whatawasteofmoney, that place is fucking terrible.

Well, i just got back from New York City about 3 days ago, and in a few hours we're hopping back on a plane to get right back over. 

The album is finished. It's incredible. We're stoked. Amazing tours coming out. Yey. 

We're all over MTV and crap. Scary. We're doing "You Hear It First" on Tuesday. 

Ski Trip in Vermont this weekend.

So, this 2 month straight voyage has made me slightly a bit homesick. Pretty ironic seeing as how i have no place to call home when I get back but I'll probably just end up stayin with my aunt. About half the record has been mixed. 

I'll probably be able to come back for about  a week and a half in a few days. That should freshen me up a bit. 

So we're scheduled for the Starting Line tour, then the warped tour including Canada (which is dope) but before that we'll be heading out with Underoath in March. Purtty crazy.

We got our pretty much brand new van and trailer previously owned by "The Killers" for a year and then given to "The Bravery". Cool beans. 

Anyways, all's well. Be back soon. <3

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year everyone. My grandfather died on Christmas morning, it was very sad

We're about 60% through the record right now. We've also been doing a bunch of footage for a DVD thingy. I bought a new digital camera, so ill probably be posting a shit load of pictures on here all the time now. The record is coming along amazing though, not just the songs, but the actual sound. The quality is phenominal. It's copmpletely worth the 16 hour days of work. 

We'll be hitting the road on tour with The Starting Line and Cartel, and we'll be on the whole warped tour including the Canada dates. How crazy. Fuckin eh? <3

My old phone broke and I just got a new one, so if you'd like me to have your phone number again, give me a ring please.

So, we're back home for the holidays. We got layed over in Atlanta last night. I almost missed both flights. Things are good. Record sounds good, got pppaaaiiiddd, it's the holidays, and we're playing a show after christmas. We're purchasing a van and trailer from the band "The Bravery" they never used it. It's supposed to be real pimp. We're taking it up to Vermont for our Snowboaring Christmas present from Virgin. Hope all is well.

Here in NYC in the middle of recording the album. It's coming along amazing, we're all stoked. We'll be back in a few weeks to play a show the day after Christmas. We'll be back a few days after to shoot a video for "Face Down." The Starting Line is crossing over and joining us on Virgin, looks like we'll have some bros. We head out on tour with them in January. Happy Holidays everyone. Shout me a holla on here to catch up. <3

Wow, the INSANE trip to NYC and back is finally over, once again that is.
Anything imaginable in NYC, we've been able to do. 
I never thought things would be like this, it's crazy. 
Just being able to shoot the shit and e-mail Taking Back Sunday. 
Looks like we've found our producer. 
We start the album at the end of the month.
It will be done by the first week of January.
We'll be on tour with The Starting Line after that.
New Year's Eve in Time Square. That's gonna be crazy.
<3

Went to the Jags game today, that shit was sweet.
Still writing new stuff. Looking forward to the new record. Probably gonna have Howard Benson for our producer (The Used, My Chemical Romance, etc.)...i guess it's the cool thing to do.
The Fair show was amazing. We're a "real" band now.
My phone flew out of my pocket while i was spnning upside at 430 miles an hour on a ride.
I thought i was doomed. We found it stuck in a fence about 15 yards away though...just chilling. Craziness.
No really though i need to cut my hair, i look more girly than anyone i know.

For anyone that cares...

"The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus," is now officially signed to Virgin Records.

if you wanna show some love or hate, feel welcomed plz. <3
Today we were on the radio, that was cool.

So the band's been writing for the new album. Things are great.
We all went down to Orlando last night because we got VIP at Hard Rock to see Fall Out Boy, Motion City Soundtrack, The Starting Line, Boys Night Out, and Panic at The Disco. 

It was a fun show. Fall Out Boy was great.

i watched "Saw" tonight. That movie was crazy. 

it wont be long before i get my first tattoo. 

We're playing an acoustic remote for 93.3 at the Nine Inch Nails Live this friday at 6.

Peace.

-It's funny looking back and reading old comments from people on this little livejournal contraption. All the haters and shiz.

-I am tired as fuck. 

-I cut my hair a bit the other day. 

-All I ever do any more is collect and watch DVD's, oh and play face-melting solos and shoot heroin with Joey because we have mullets. 

-The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus will be playing Planet Fest this year with Yellowcard, Shine Down, Cold, and an un-confirmed Limp Bizkit performance. That shit is weird. It also looks like we're gonna be gone for a LONG time. 

-Fuck it I'm buying a car and signing Jonra.

Has anyone heard that new band "Fall Out Boy," or something like that on 95.1?!?!

They ROCK! 

Dude, I'm probably the wealthiest, homeless, car-less person in the world.

Im going to cut my hair soon

Wow, the last 2 weeks have probably been the best 2 weeks of my life.

Got a taste of the whole United States.
Met everyone famous you could imagine...

Tommy Lee
Richard Simmons
Renee Russo
Dennis Quaid
Earth Wind and Fire
Switchfoot
Every record label
VIP, first class, 5 star
blah blah blah

playing with Shine Down tonight (Acoustic) at Freebird.

Leaving for L.A. with the Jumpsuit on Thursday 

bye

p.s. We're playing Tom. night at jack rabbits if anyone's interested

Gainesville was huge

The engine in my car blew up...

today is a special day
any takers?

I seriously can't wait til i get my platinum grill. Im dead serious btw.
$$$
boomshakalaka

Being on The Warped Tour was awesome...
One of the best experiences of my life...
Our Hotel Suites were amazing...
We spent most of our time away getting naked and shooting each other with bee bee guns...
Post Show Barbeque every night with the bands was sweet even though we felt like the dorks in highschool again eating with Fall Out Boy, My Chemical, Transplants, and Bleeding Through...
Countdown to New York City! Can't wait to rock some New York Asses...
Leave me a comment...and I'll, read it

It's so cool seeing "The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus" all over MTV2 and FUSE for the Warped Tour...crazy shiz.
Hope some people are coming out to support local music.
We'll be headin up to NYC for alittle while after the tour.
Goodbye middleburg.
The show on the 23rd was amazing, so many kids, someone stole my shirt : (.

Man, it's been alittle while.
Well, it's summer and it's hot as fuck.
Once again i must leave another place ive called home.
Things for redjumpsuit are going amazing.
My best friend is in my band, couldn't ask for more. And John works out amazing on drums.
We're playing a show tonight (Saturday July 23rd @ Freebird is anyone cares)
We'll also be on all the Florida Warped Tour Dates.
Life is good.
Back from Georgia...shit's going good...leave me a comment.

I am now the proud owner of a brand new Mesa Boogie Dual Rectifier...
that feels good...

Damn Myspace, get yo shit straight nigga

I'm being thrown away, will anyone take me in?




A little conversation between me and this half asian chick:
dashxboard23: how much do you love it?
prettyin19pink85: almost as much as i like "shacking up" with random dudes 
prettyin19pink85: seriously cuz stds are hott 
dashxboard23: duh
prettyin19pink85: i already have like 987987
prettyin19pink85: im gettin up there 
dashxboard23: seriously...fuck myspace
prettyin19pink85: i did last night 
dashxboard23: slut
prettyin19pink85: ehh you wouldnt answer ur phone
prettyin19pink85: dont be jealous 
dashxboard23: i knew you wanted me 
dashxboard23: is it because i look like a girl?
prettyin19pink85: duh

Am I the only person who thinks that fireworks are overated?
Sorry I do not enjoy standing around for hours surrounded by hundreds of sweaty fatties and getting stuck in traffic just to hear loud noises and develop an awesome headache...
Id rather light shit on fire with my best friends.
I dunno, Im the July 4th grinch.

It's so funny how amazing and surprising such dark situations can become sometimes
Thousands of people could have been affected in a negative way
But I knew this could possibly be the best thing to happen
It's been nothing more than a blessing in disguise
Rock bottom in a certain aspect once again but it's beyond for best
Today was filled with heartache, I wanted to cry for the first time in a long time
Sacrifices have to be made when people lose hope and desire and no matter how much you wish you could change things, you have to accept it and make the best decision
Like I always say...
"The sweet aint as sweet without the bitter"
"Every passing minute is just another chance to turn it all around"
Everyone will know what I'm talking about very soon 
I'm so sorry

Very very bad news coming soon for some...

Oh well, as one thing ends another begins...soon...hopefully
life's good life's good life's good life's good then BAM rock bottom

im gonna watch "Wet Hot American Summer" before i go to bed...if you haven't seen it...you haven't lived

lots of trips and such coming up...im excited

people were taking pictures of me at the mall today...i felt like i was in Japan

the next few months are going to be amazing

The Tampa show couldn't have been more amazing...
We played at what was basically a House of Blues and makes Freebird look like a shit-hole.
The Venue was by far the best we've ever seen. 3 stories, 4 bars, HUGE floor and the stage was enormous.
When we got there, there were already about 100 kids in line way before the doors opened. They all knew who we were. It was amazing and the kids who didnt know who we were and all the words to the songs were beyond receptive. The drive there sucked, but the drive back was great. Tampa is officially our home away from home.
-Can't wait til Warped Tour. 

-I work at AE now

-So many good CD's are coming out this year...im stoked.

Well the show was amazing...sold out...it was great
One of the AC units was broken so it was 83798248 degrees in there...thank God.

anyways...my whole body is in pain so i must now retire to my bed...we're heading to Tampa tom. Thanks everyone who made it out...it was a great show! <3


p.s. i got a $205 speeding ticket last night...that was awesome

Tallahasee was amazing...i cant wait to go back...

noted things from the trip...

-me and phil are officially insanely retarded
-Yueng Ling is the worst smelling beer the day after a keg party
-It was amazing seeing old friends
-Their neighbor Dante is an Ambliant master
-Cleaning is fun
-Lizzy's room turns into Anartica after midnight and she puts you in solitary confinement
-i was reminded how much i love long conversations and life story transaction times
-my colon disease was trying to get the best of me...so i had to fight it with lots of beer
-i suck ass at beer pong
-invisible beer is ruining my life
-phil's first love is smoking pot...not Mary
-I make by far the best french toast
-we're all animals on the inside
-i found my soul mate and it's a kangaroo
-thanks for everything 

RED JUMPSUIT is playing a show THIS FRIDAY June 17th at Jackrabbits...doors should open at 7. Check the site for more info. <3

Welcome back Mr. Colon Disease. 

Life almost let me forget about you, you bastard. 

Bleeding is fun kids.

The show last Friday night was packed and fun as shit. Thankyou everyone who came out and got snotted-on by me. I was sick. My B. 



We have a NEW SONG on the Red Jumpsuit myspace page if anyone's interested...It's called "Waiting" leave us a comment and let us know what you think. Go here...

www.myspace.com/redjumpsuit

Oh yeah, we'll be on some warped tour dates this year...yey!

1. Reply with your name and I will write something I like about you.
2. I will then tell what song reminds me of you.
3. If I were to apply an o'clock to you, I'll tell you what it would be.
4. I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
5. I'll tell you the most memorable moment I've had with you.
6. I will tell you what color you remind me of.
7. I'll then tell you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. Put this in your journal

If you'd like to hear "Justify" by Red Jumpsuit on the radio go here... http://www.redjumpsuit.com/radio..mp3

There's also a new video for "Justify" on T.V. It comes on every Wednesday night at around 10:35-10:40 on Channel 7.
You can also check it out here if you have a super sonic computer like me...

http://onlocationtv.com/ol8-web.mpg


i put the wrong link for the video last time i updated this if anyone cares...sorry <3 The show last night was AMAZING. So many kids screaming. Can't wait for tour.

My Car is fixed...yey!


If you'd like to hear "Justify" by Red Jumpsuit on the radio go here... http://www.redjumpsuit.com/radio..mp3

There's also a new video for "Justify" on T.V. It comes on every Wednesday night at around 10:35-10:40 on Channel 7.
